heroSection.end: The 14th edition has come to an end. Thank you for participating!
heroSection.faculty: Faculty of Mathematics and Informatics, University of Bucharest
heroSection.teaser: Cariere returns this year with a lot of opportunities for students
heroSection.welcome: Welcome to the official website of the Cariere project!

aboutSection.eventDescription1: is a job and internship fair that fosters students' professional development by connecting participants with some of the most well-known IT companies in Romania.
aboutSection.eventDescription2: Since 2010, Cariere has brought together top IT employers and curious students with a passion for the tech field with the help of volunteers from the Mathematics and Computer Science Student Association.
aboutSection.partners: Discover the offers of our partners
aboutSection.partnersDescription: Partner companies provide students with relevant information regarding their recruitment and hiring process through interactive presentations and workshops, where participants can learn more about their work profiles.

partnersSection.title: Our partners
partnersSection.comingSoon: We will announce the participating companies for this year's edition soon.
partnersSection.followOurSocialMediaPages: Follow our social media pages to stay updated with all the news.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.carlo: A very useful project, without which I wouldn't have found relevant information for employment.
testimonials.mihai: My experience at the career fair was very positive. I appreciated the involvement of the volunteers, the good and efficient organization, and the prompt communication that facilitated access to your next job. I believe this event is vital during the professional development period of any student at FMI, making it much easier to interact with potential employers in the IT field.
testimonials.anca: I was hired at Amiq, a company I learned about at Cariere. Cariere is a very useful event for students, I discovered many companies I wasn't familiar with and was able to learn about available jobs by speaking directly with company employees.

eventsSection.title: Events
eventsSection.noEvents: There are no events scheduled. Check back later!
